Name: Eligible funds exemption for veterans.
Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the eligible funds exemption for veterans

History.Action: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
History.Description: This Introduction was Hearing on P-C Item by Comm

History.Action: P-C Item Laid Over by Comm
History.Description: This Introduction was P-C Item Laid Over by Comm

History.Action: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
History.Description: This Introduction was Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
A motion was made that this Introduction be P-C Item Approved by Comm approved by Roll Call.
This Introduction was Introduced by Council
This Introduction was Referred to Comm by Council to the Committee on Finance
A motion was made that this Introduction be Approved by Council approved by consent Roll Call.
This Introduction was Sent to Mayor by Council
This Introduction was Hearing Held by Mayor
This Introduction was City Charter Rule Adopted
History.MinutesNote: This bill was returned unsigned on Tues. 12-19-2017 (31st Day, Sun. 12-17-2017).

Summary: This local law would establish that the Eligible Funds Exemption for veterans is applicable to school taxation.
Text:
Be it enacted by the Council as follows:
      
      
      Section 1. Part 1 of subchapter 2 of chapter 2 of title 11 of the administrative code of the city of New York is amended by adding a new section 11-245.46 to read as follows:
      � 11-245.46  Exemption for veterans; taxes for school purposes exempted. Pursuant to paragraph (3) of subdivision one of section four hundred fifty-eight of the real property tax law, the city hereby provides that the exemption authorized pursuant to such section shall be applicable to taxes for school purposes.
      �2. This local law takes effect January 1, 2018.
      

ENB
LS #11799
